dmca.title: PIERCING-KINGDOM.INFO Copyright Violation!
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----
From: MissKittens [mailto:support@tattoodesign.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, April 11, 2006 8:53 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Cc: abuse@theplanet.com
Subject: PIERCING-KINGDOM.INFO Copyright Violation!

Hello,
the domain is back up again? Please stop this illgal activity!
Thank you.

Hello,

I'm writing about the domain name "NSWEBHOST.COM," which is hosted on your
IP 70.84.253.132. This domain is the nameserver for another domain,
"PIERCING-KINGDOM.INFO," which is infringing on my copyright.
PIERCING-KINGDOM.INFO is registered with obviously fake information, and the
identity of the owner is protected by a WHOIS anonymizer. This domain
contains multiple copies of the index page for my site, "TATTOODESIGN.COM."
Here are some examples:

http://www.piercing-kingdom.info/lowbacktrible.html
http://www.piercing-kingdom.info/freelowback.html
http://www.piercing-kingdom.info/nicole.html
http://www.piercing-kingdom.info/princealbertpiercphoto.html
http://www.piercing-kingdom.info/poltattpic.html
http://www.piercing-kingdom.info/gothangel.html

There are many others.

Please inform your client who controls "NSWEBHOST.COM" that he must remove
these illegal copies. If they are not removed immediately, I will take
additional steps to secure my intellectual property. Since you, The Planet,
are providing hosting services for this illegal activity, I expect you to
take steps to ensure your compliance with the law.

Thank you,
Andreas Meier
